Package context.apps.demos.imautostatus


Class Summary
AutostatusApplication IM Autostatus demo application to illustrate how to combine widgets, generators, and enactors for an application that uses a decision tree classifier to predict buddy response time.
AutostatusDescriptiveExplainerDelegate Utility class to convert feature names to user-meaningful descriptive text.
AutostatusEnactor Enactor to handle classifier reasoning for IM Autostatus application.
AutostatusGenerator Class to populate and update a AutostatusWidget from a WEKA dataset.
AutostatusIntelligibleApplication Main application with GUI to display the IM Autostatus chat window.
AutostatusWidget Widget to represent the state of the input features of the IM Autostatus application.
ChatWindow Window to display GUI for the instant messaging chat simulation.
ConsoleStringPresenter  
QueryParser Convenience class to parse a Query from the Chat window command prompt.
ResponsivenessWidget Widget to represent the responsiveness status of a buddy.
